{
  "$schema": "https://json.schemastore.org/claude-code-settings.json",
  "permissions": {
    "allow": ["Read(**)", "Bash(npm:*)"],
    "deny": ["Bash(rm -rf:*)"],
    "ask": ["Edit", "Write"]
  },
  "enabledPlugins": {
    "document-skills@anthropic-agent-skills": true
  },
  "cleanupPeriodDays": 30
}

  }
}
{
  "permissions": {
    "allow": ["Bash(pytest:*)"]
  }
}
